casebody.data:
The State ex rel. RMI Titanium Company, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio; Williams, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. RMI Titanium Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 546.]

(No. 98-96 Submitted September 15, 1998 Decided November 10, 1998.) Jane P. Wilson & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Jane P. Wilson, for appellee. Green, Haines, Sgambati, Murphy & Macota Co., L.P.A., Ronald E. Slipski and Steven L. Paulson, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the order of the Industrial Commission is reinstated.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissenting. I would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., concur in the foregoing dissenting opinion.
